sn22.101:1.2: “Janato aham, bhikkhave, passato asavanam khayam vadami, no ajanato no apassato.
sn22.101:1.3: Kinca, bhikkhave, janato kim passato asavanam khayo hoti?
sn22.101:1.4: ‘Iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
sn22.101:1.8: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti—
sn22.101:1.9: evam kho, bhikkhave, janato evam passato asavanam khayo hoti.
sn22.101:2.1: Bhavananuyogam ananuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato kincapi evam iccha uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:2.2: ‘aho vata me anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucceyya’ti, atha khvassa neva anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccati.
sn22.101:2.6: Abhavitatta catunnam satipatthananam, abhavitatta catunnam sammappadhananam, abhavitatta catunnam iddhipadanam, abhavitatta pancannam indriyanam, abhavitatta pancannam balanam, abhavitatta sattannam bojjhanganam, abhavitatta ariyassa atthangikassa maggassa.
sn22.101:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kukkutiya andani attha va dasa va dvadasa va.
sn22.101:3.2: Tanassu kukkutiya na samma adhisayitani, na samma pariseditani, na samma paribhavitani.
sn22.101:3.3: Kincapi tassa kukkutiya evam iccha uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:3.4: ‘aho vata me kukkutapotaka padanakhasikhaya va mukhatundakena va andakosam padaletva sotthina abhinibbhijjeyyun’ti,
sn22.101:3.5: atha kho abhabbava te kukkutapotaka padanakhasikhaya va mukhatundakena va andakosam padaletva sotthina abhinibbhijjitum.
sn22.101:3.7: Tatha hi pana, bhikkhave, kukkutiya andani attha va dasa va dvadasa va;
sn22.101:3.8: tani kukkutiya na samma adhisayitani, na samma pariseditani, na samma paribhavitani.
sn22.101:3.9: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhavananuyogam ananuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato kincapi evam iccha uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:3.10: ‘aho vata me anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucceyya’ti, atha khvassa neva anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccati.
sn22.101:4.1: Bhavananuyogam anuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato kincapi na evam iccha uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:4.2: ‘aho vata me anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucceyya’ti, atha khvassa anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccati.
sn22.101:4.6: Bhavitatta catunnam satipatthananam, bhavitatta catunnam sammappadhananam, bhavitatta catunnam iddhipadanam, bhavitatta pancannam indriyanam, bhavitatta pancannam balanam, bhavitatta sattannam bojjhanganam, bhavitatta ariyassa atthangikassa maggassa.
sn22.101:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kukkutiya andani attha va dasa va dvadasa va.
sn22.101:5.2: Tanassu kukkutiya samma adhisayitani, samma pariseditani, samma paribhavitani.
sn22.101:5.3: Kincapi tassa kukkutiya na evam iccha uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:5.4: ‘aho vata me kukkutapotaka padanakhasikhaya va mukhatundakena va andakosam padaletva sotthina abhinibbhijjeyyun’ti,
sn22.101:5.5: atha kho bhabbava te kukkutapotaka padanakhasikhaya va mukhatundakena va andakosam padaletva sotthina abhinibbhijjitum.
sn22.101:5.7: Tatha hi pana, bhikkhave, kukkutiya andani attha va dasa va dvadasa va;
sn22.101:5.8: tanassu kukkutiya samma adhisayitani, samma pariseditani, samma paribhavitani.
sn22.101:5.9: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhavananuyogam anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato kincapi na evam iccha uppajjeyya:
sn22.101:5.10: ‘aho vata me anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucceyya’ti, atha khvassa anupadaya asavehi cittam vimuccati.
sn22.101:5.14: Bhavitatta catunnam satipatthananam …pe… bhavitatta ariyassa atthangikassa maggassa.
sn22.101:6.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, palagandassa va palagandantevasissa va vasijate dissanteva angulipadani dissati angutthapadam.
sn22.101:6.2: No ca khvassa evam nanam hoti:
sn22.101:6.3: ‘ettakam vata me ajja vasijatassa khinam, ettakam hiyyo, ettakam pare’ti.
sn22.101:6.4: Atha khvassa khine khinantveva nanam hoti.
sn22.101:6.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhavananuyogam anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato kincapi na evam nanam hoti:
sn22.101:6.6: ‘ettakam vata me ajja asavanam khinam, ettakam hiyyo, ettakam pare’ti, atha khvassa khine khinantveva nanam hoti.
sn22.101:6.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, samuddikaya navaya vettabandhanabaddhaya vassamasani udake pariyadaya hemantikena thalam ukkhittaya vatatapaparetani vettabandhanani. Tani pavusakena meghena abhippavutthani appakasireneva patippassambhanti putikani bhavanti;
sn22.101:6.8: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhavananuyogam anuyuttassa bhikkhuno viharato appakasireneva samyojanani patippassambhanti putikani bhavanti”ti.
